hello.title: Hello
hello.description: This is a sample document to demonstrate the Docusaurus documentation structure for the Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics textbook.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: Welcome to the Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics textbook. This comprehensive guide covers the fundamental concepts, practical implementations, and cutting-edge research in the field of physical artificial intelligence and humanoid robotics.

learning-objectives.title: Learning Objectives
learning-objectives.description: Learning objectives for the Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics course

module-1/capstone-project.title: Module 1 Capstone Project: Physical AI System Integration
module-1/capstone-project.description: Integrate all Module 1 concepts into a comprehensive Physical AI system demonstrating embodied cognition and environmental interaction.

module-1/index.title: Module 1: Foundations of Physical AI
module-1/index.description: Foundations of Physical AI and embodied intelligence

module-1/week-1/exercises.title: Week 1 Exercises: Foundations of Physical AI
module-1/week-1/exercises.description: Practical exercises to reinforce understanding of Physical AI concepts and principles.

module-1/week-1/foundations.title: 1.1 Foundations of Physical AI
module-1/week-1/foundations.description: Deep dive into the core principles of Physical AI and how intelligence differs when operating in physical systems.

module-1/week-1/index.description: Introduction to Physical AI and embodied intelligence concepts

module-1/week-1/quiz.title: Week 1 Quiz: Foundations of Physical AI
module-1/week-1/quiz.description: Test your understanding of Physical AI concepts and principles.

module-1/week-2/exercises.description: Practical exercises to implement and understand ROS2 concepts for Physical AI systems.

module-1/week-2/index.description: Sensorimotor learning and perception in physical AI systems

module-1/week-2/quiz.description: Test your understanding of ROS2 concepts and implementation for Physical AI systems.

module-1/week-2/ros2-core-concepts.description: Deep dive into ROS2 core concepts with practical implementation details for Physical AI systems.

module-1/week-2/ros2-intro.title: 1.2 Introduction to ROS2
module-1/week-2/ros2-intro.description: Learn about the Robot Operating System version 2, its architecture, and core concepts for robotics development.

module-1/week-3/embodied-cognition.title: 1.4 Embodied Cognition in Physical AI
module-1/week-3/embodied-cognition.description: Explore the principles of embodied cognition and how physical form influences intelligent behavior in robotics.

module-1/week-3/environmental-interactio.title: 1.5 Environmental Interaction in Physical AI
module-1/week-3/environmental-interactio.description: Explore how Physical AI systems interact with and adapt to their environments.

module-1/week-3/exercises.title: Week 3 Exercises: Embodied Cognition and Environmental Interaction
module-1/week-3/exercises.description: Practical exercises to implement and understand embodied cognition and environmental interaction principles.

module-1/week-3/index.description: Embodied cognition and environmental interaction in physical AI

module-1/week-3/quiz.title: Week 3 Quiz: Embodied Cognition and Environmental Interaction
module-1/week-3/quiz.description: Test your understanding of embodied cognition and environmental interaction in Physical AI systems.

module-2/capstone-project.description: Integrate all Module 2 concepts into a comprehensive simulation project with robot, sensors, physics, and ROS2 integration.

module-2/week-1/gazebo-fundamentals.description: Introduction to Gazebo simulation environment and core concepts for robotics development.

module-2/week-2/exercises.description: Practical exercises to reinforce understanding of robot model integration in Gazebo.

module-2/week-2/robot-model-integration.description: Import and configure robot models in Gazebo using URDF and SDF formats.

module-2/week-3/physics-sensor-simulatio.description: Configure physics properties and sensor models for realistic simulation in Gazebo.

module-2/week-4/gazebo-ros2-integration.description: Connect ROS2 nodes to Gazebo simulation environment for hardware-in-the-loop testing.

module-3/week-1/isaac-sim-setup.description: Configure and set up NVIDIA Isaac Sim for robotics simulation

module-3/week-1/lab-1-isaac-sim-basics.description: Hands-on lab exercise to practice Isaac Sim fundamentals

module-3/week-3/navigation-pipeline-basi.description: Learn the fundamentals of navigation pipelines in Isaac Sim using Isaac ROS navigation packages

module-3/week-3/path-planning-obstacle-a.description: Advanced concepts in path planning and obstacle avoidance for robotics navigation

module-3/week-4/lab-4-sim-to-real-transf.description: Implement domain randomization techniques and test sim-to-real transfer for a robotic navigation task

module-3/week-4/sim-to-real-concepts.description: Understanding the challenges and techniques for transferring robotics algorithms from simulation to real-world deployment

module-3/week-5/module-3-assessment.description: Assessment covering Isaac Sim, Isaac ROS, perception pipelines, navigation, and sim-to-real transfer concepts
